page.title: 02HOUSING
page.content: HOUSING _______ Bethesda is the centre of a large rural district.Braichmelyn,Gerlan, Carneddi and Llanllechid are all village_like areas surrounding the town.Llanllechid typifies the quarrymans home.The streets are straight and narrow.The houses are small and compact.There are 174 terraced houses on the High street and adjoining streets.There are 30 cottages,9 semi_detatched and 2 new bungalows in the area.Two of the council estates were built in the 1930's.A total of 71 three bedroomed semis.The other two estates built during the last twenty years have 15 bungalows and 15 semi_detatched houses.
